name: Dance of The Treasure Goblin
description:
Make the Goblin Dance and Fling Money!

What Lies Behind The LOOMING GATE?!

Inspired by a strange old 1982 arcade game called Wacko, you can relive my experience playing it for the first time when I stubbornly ignored the instructions!

Controls are mouse and wasd.

I have released version 1.3 which is "feature complete" (but possibly still broken).

This was created for Wizard Jam 4. Idle Thumbs podcast & community are cool dudes all.
